qa.question: How do I check stock?
qa.answer: You can check out how to check stock in store and online here!

qa.question: Can I return items?
qa.answer: If youâ€™re not totally satisfied, we have several different ways you can return products to us.

qa.question: Can I track my delivery?
qa.answer: Yes! We offer order tracking online for you to keep track of your items while they are on a journey to their forever homes.

qa.question: Can I bring my pet into an IKEA store?
qa.answer: Registered service animals, such as guide dogs and hearing assistance dogs, are always welcome!

qa.question: Do you provide extra or replacement parts?
qa.answer: Yes, you can order spare parts online and get them delivered directly to your door.

qa.question: Can I borrow a wheelchair in your stores?
qa.answer: Yes, you can find them inside each store entrance area!

qa.question: Can I use IKEA Gift Cards or e-vouchers in other countries?
qa.answer: You can use IKEA gift cards or IKEA e-vouchers in other countries, but there are limitations.

qa.question: Can I cancel my online order before delivery?
qa.answer: You can manage, track and cancel the order you have placed online using your order number and email address.

qa.question: I missed my collection timeslot, what can I do?
qa.answer: If you are unable to collect your order, do not fear.

qa.question: Can I add items onto my order after purchase?
qa.answer: You cannot add any products onto your order after it has been placed.

qa.question: Does IKEA offer an NHS / Key Worker Discount?
qa.answer: At present IKEA does not offer a discount to NHS staff or key workers...
